item.title: Sticky Notes
item.author: nikhilweee@gmail.com (Nikhil Verma)
item.description: This page hosts little ideas, solutions to problems I’ve faced in the past or mistakes that I don’t want to repeat again - stored here as a reference in case they bother me again. Read on, maybe even you might find something relevant! Table of Contents Some useful aliases Docker and DC++ Test outgoing ports Use Google Fonts offline Installing Node Installing OpenCV Raspberry Pi Configure Mutt with Gmail Remove Python Package with Dependencies Academic writing with Pandoc PuDB Custom Stringifier Interesting Jekyll Themes Some useful aliases Timesync!
